DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study pilot test intervention improve oral health individual memory problem . The result study assist develop prevention intervention program aim maintain good oral health , least slow deterioration .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Health Intervention Pilot Study Individuals With Memory Problems
DOC.detailed_description: This project involve two phase . The main purpose Phase 1 conduct focus group 6 individual mild dementia ( IMDs ) live-in partner ( usually spouse ) conduct in-depth interview staff community organization ( e.g. , dementia caregiver support group staff ) develop protocol . Information Phase 1 provide input refine propose pilot intervention Phase 2 project . The pilot oral health intervention last 6 month conduct ten IMDs live-in partner .
DOC.criteria: A diagnosis mild dementia within past year . Have least four natural teeth . 60 year old . Living informal caregiver willing participate . Communitydwelling Physically able brush teeth . Edentulism Unable oral health evaluation do . Sensory physical problem prevent participation intervention . Terminal illness hospitalization psychiatric disorder prior year .
